documents.title: Emergency Safety Protocol Update - Track Circuit Failure Handling
documents.content: Immediate implementation required for new track circuit failure protocols. All operations staff must undergo mandatory training within 48 hours. Updated procedures for signal failure response during peak hours.

documents.title: Monthly Maintenance Schedule - Rolling Stock October 2025
documents.content: Scheduled preventive maintenance for coaches MS-301 to MS-320. Operations to plan service adjustments during maintenance windows. Expected downtime 6 hours per unit.

documents.title: Vendor Payment Approval - Signaling System Components
documents.content: Invoice processing for signaling system components worth Rs. 45 lakhs from M/s Signal Tech India. Payment terms 30 days. Budget code: CAPEX-2025-SIG-078

documents.title: MoHUA Directive - Accessibility Standards Compliance Review
documents.source_authority: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
documents.content: Ministry directive for comprehensive accessibility audit of all 22 stations. Report submission required by November 15, 2025. Focus areas: tactile paving, auditory announcements, wheelchair access, and staff training compliance.

documents.title: Incident Report - Platform Overcrowding at Aluva Station
documents.content: Critical incident on September 29, 2025, 08:45 AM. Platform overcrowding due to service delay. Approximately 500 passengers affected. Root cause: signal failure at previous station. Immediate review of crowd management protocols required.

documents.title: HR Policy Update - Annual Leave Revision 2025-26
documents.content: Updated annual leave policy effective January 2026. Changes include: increased casual leave from 8 to 10 days, new parental leave provisions, and modified carry-forward rules. All departments to update leave management systems.

documents.title: Engineering Drawing Amendment - Depot Extension Phase 2
documents.content: Revised engineering drawings for Muttom Depot extension. Key changes: stabling line configuration, pit depth modifications, and drainage system updates. Contractor coordination required for material procurement.

documents.title: Board Meeting Minutes - September 2025 Review
documents.content: Key decisions from September board meeting: approval for Phase 2A extension, budget allocation for new rolling stock procurement, strategic partnerships with Bangalore Metro, and Q2 financial performance review.

documents.title: Environmental Compliance Notice - Noise Level Monitoring
documents.content: Quarterly noise level monitoring report submission required. Focus on residential zones near Kaloor and Palarivattom stations. Compliance with CPCB standards mandatory. Third-party audit recommended.

documents.title: Purchase Order Confirmation - HVAC System Spare Parts
documents.content: PO issued to M/s Climate Control Systems for HVAC spare parts. Delivery scheduled for October 25, 2025. Total value: Rs. 28 lakhs. Maintenance team to coordinate warehouse storage and installation planning.
